Text: FW hockeyA friend of mine who works for Clear Channel passed this on to me Thought you might be interested He tells me that their suite is on the blue line Pat Original Message From Baldwin Chris mailto learChannelcom Sent Thursday October PM To Downey Pat Subject hockey Dear Hockey Fans Here are the upcoming dates for the Avalanchethese are open dates for purchasing the corporate suite at This includes tickets and first rate catering Renting the suite for an Avs game is a fantastic way to entertain your top clients prospects or employees The Avs always have a packed house full of positive energy The events are a great way to entertain in one of Denvers newest facilitiesThe Pepsi Center All of these are sold on first come first serve basis Carolina St Louis NY Islanders Edmonton Ottawa Columbus Minnesota Philadelphia NY Rangers San Jose Buffalo Los Angeles Detroit Chicago Calgary Dallas Washington Nashville Vancouver Now if you are interested in the Nuggets box for a night contact me and negotiations will be dependent on the specific game and availibility We will be happy to negotiate an attractive deal to give you the priviledge of seeingYOUR DENVER NUGGETS Sincerely Chris Baldwin
